nodes.text: Captain Deevis was the commander of the Mon Mothma in 29 ABY.

Deevis, who participated in some of heaviest fighting of the Yuuzhan Vong War, was present at the Second Battle of Borleias, serving under Wedge Antilles. Deevis would also later serve in the Battle of Yuuzhan'tar, during which Coruscant was retaken from the Yuuzhan Vong.
